articles.content: Following the introduction of the NoiseFit Grace smartwatch, Noise has now unveiled the Buds Xero, its high-end true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds. Boasting 12.4mm drivers and a blend of PEEK and Tit… [+1956 chars]
